website_summaries.verdict: 26-millimeter by 1.5-inch quick-release front wheel in silver.
pros: High-quality material used to make this wheel, which is tested for durability
Quick release axle for easy replacement
Can be used on both regular terrain and mountain bikes
Most purchasers say it's strong and a good replacement wheel, especially for the low price
cons: A few consumers claimed that the wheel arrived and needed adjustment before it could be used

customer_reviews.title: 1~2mm side-to-side wobble, and 2~3mm up-and-down precession
customer_reviews.text: Shipped in a large box with bubble wrap throughout for protection, this front wheel was 1~2 millimeters (mm) side-to-side untrue, and 2~3 mm eccentric. I can deal with fixing the side-to-side to limit the throw required for breaking, the eccentricity is difficult to fix. While cheap enough for my city commuter, not great for someone needing out-of-the-box visible perfection.
customer_reviews.author: G's

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the price, but seller should let the buyer know that the bearings need to be greased, could have made the mistake of using it not lubricated
customer_reviews.author: GeorgeD

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Not perfectly true and wider than the wheel it replaced which might require brake adjustment. Doesn’t seem particularly sturdy for off-road either. Anyway cheapest option out there unless you can get good used.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Davis

customer_reviews.title: Quite good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Overall, pretty good. A bit out of true visibly, but not enough to rub the pads. Does not come with rim strip or tape; my old wheel's fit so I don't know the width needed (check other reviewers). Seems durable except maybe for heavy off-road. Def worth it for the price. NOTE: this was just placed in a box and shipped; no packing material (hub was zip-tied to spoke) - this may allow for damage, and perhaps I got lucky. YMMV
customer_reviews.author: Dan Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Great wheel
customer_reviews.text: Very good value for a great bicycle wheel. Arrived in perfect condition, spins straight and works as designed.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: arrived on schedule and seems to be a quality product. on the bike and in service with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: shopper98944

customer_reviews.title: Add grease to the bearings before use!
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement easy to put on. However, as previously noted grease is not included and needs to be applied before is!
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Great Front Wheel replacement for an older bike
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace a wheel that got ran over by a car. It was a perfect fit and now I have my bike as good as new.
customer_reviews.author: Andre Bouravnev

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement wheel without the high price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Gary Fisher hybrid bike. It fit perfectly, installed easily and rides great!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine L. Goldshot

customer_reviews.title: Came bent
customer_reviews.text: This wheel came packaged just fine with no package damage, but the wheel came bent. Returning. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: C. Ruwe

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The wheel was not true. It functions, but the name belies the condition.
customer_reviews.author: DHM

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: As described, excellent quality. Held up great since installed several months ago, bike riden daily.
customer_reviews.author: Lenard L. Milholland Jr.

customer_reviews.title: The wheel
customer_reviews.text: The wheel works as replacement for previous broken spoke wheel.
customer_reviews.author: ArtL

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Designed and appearance matches my older mountain bikes ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Designed and appearance matches my older mountain bikes rim perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: James S. Middleton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice but it was the wrong style. Extremely easy to return for the correct one!
customer_reviews.author: Tg

customer_reviews.title: Straight and true
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for my daughters Schwinn Ranger MTB. Was true, no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M. Harms

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice, basic wheel. No safety tabs, which are only a nuisance anyway in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Janet D

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: No issues - a few months in and the wheel is living up to its name by "Staying True"
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Prefect fit
customer_reviews.text: This rim was delivered a couple of days after I ordered it. It was very easy for me to transfer the liner, tube and tire from my original wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Martinson

customer_reviews.title: No Rim Tape on the wheel.
customer_reviews.text: The wheel looks good but has no Rim tape on the wheel. Now I have to find some tape to keep the spokes ends from popping the tube.
customer_reviews.author: TONY

customer_reviews.title: out of the box it is not "true" it is good enough to ride on though
customer_reviews.text: The wheel is okay, out of the box it is not "true" it is good enough to ride on though. The hub doesn't feel the greatest but again it's okay, this is a budget wheel, I hope it is durable. Next time I will spend more and hopefully get better.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery Misiaszek

customer_reviews.title: The wheel was shipped within the time line, and ...
customer_reviews.text: The wheel was shipped within the time line, and wasn't damaged. When installed it was true and needed no adjustment.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Carter

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: I ride daily and need a sturdy wheel as the streets here are not the best lol the wheels were shipped promptly and were more than i could have hoped for i had to buy a new wheel last year and for the same price i got both a front and rear wheel couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.author: mark david strauss

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's does an excellent job at keeping my bike up! No problems with this product at all.
customer_reviews.author: daveml

customer_reviews.title: Worse thing is the spokes are totally oxidized after one year.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a rear and a front wheel from these jokers. I wish they were made in China because these americans are making junk. The bearings on both were too tight and I had to adjust them myself. Worse thing is the front wheel was way out of true... Sta-tru my butt... they don't even ship them true in their giant box they can't blame it on the shipper. Their quality control is a joke! Hope they last a few years. I'm going to ride on them now after I did their work for them. It's a good thing I know how to use a spoke wrench and straightened it out or I would have sent this junk back.
customer_reviews.author: Hollywoody

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I would like to return this cause it does not fit on my bike
customer_reviews.author: dennis carroll

customer_reviews.title: egged, will not run. no more online rims ...
customer_reviews.text: egged, will not run. no more online rims for me.
customer_reviews.author: wlc

customer_reviews.title: great finish on the rim
customer_reviews.text: Wheel was true when it arrived, great finish on the rim. The QR has a chrome lever but black plastic at the end of the skewer but not a biggie.
customer_reviews.author: MrBurrito

customer_reviews.title: excellent craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: The 1st wheel I ordered on Amazon, from another vendor, was of really poor quality. It was a refurbished re-chromed wheel. it was missing a lug, had a bent spoke, and there was evidence that the rim was damaged. This is an aluminum wheel with no imperfections. I am still learning the mechanics of bicycles. A quick release wheel has to replace an old quick release.
customer_reviews.author: shoxked

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price, fast delivery, and met my expectations. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I received this very fast and in great condition. After I put the inner tube and tire on it was very easy to put on my bike
customer_reviews.author: Shaneka

customer_reviews.title: Wheel Rim Cracked after 5 Rides!
customer_reviews.text: Rode on this wheel 5 times and now it is has a crack in the sidewalls of the rim. Not an aggressive Mnt bike rider. Very disappointed. Amazon offering no replacement options at this time.
customer_reviews.author: Freddie

customer_reviews.title: so so
customer_reviews.text: Ok rim for the price. The dimension is not correct(width). Overall diameter is correct.
customer_reviews.author: max mendoza

product_meta.title: Sta-Tru Silver Alloy ATB Hub Quick Release Front Wheel (26X1.5-Inch)
product_meta.description: Replacement wheel assembled in the United States of America.
feature_bullets: Made using the highest quality materials
Silver hub / silver spokes / silver rim

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
